questions.question: What is the correct syntax to define a function in JavaScript?
Which method is used to parse a JSON string in JavaScript?
What does `undefined` mean in JavaScript?
options: A variable is not assigned a value
A variable is assigned a null value
A variable is declared but not initialized
questions.correctAnswer: A variable is not assigned a value

questions.question: Which operator is used for strict equality comparison in JavaScript?
How can you add an event listener to a button in JavaScript?
What does `NaN` stand for in JavaScript?
Which of the following is a valid way to declare a variable in JavaScript?
Which of the following is not a valid JavaScript data type?
What does the `push()` method do in JavaScript?
options: Adds an element to the beginning of an array
Adds an element to the end of an array
Removes an element from the array
questions.correctAnswer: Adds an element to the end of an array

questions.question: What is the purpose of the `this` keyword in JavaScript?
options: Refers to the object that owns the function
questions.correctAnswer: Refers to the object that owns the function
